title: Vidhi A. Sharma
text:
About Me
Hi, I’m Vidhi Sharma, currently pursuing my Master’s in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University. With a background in Computer Science and hands-on experience in analytics, operations, and business strategy, I specialize in turning messy data into crystal-clear action.
I’ve worked across a range of industries and tools, from streamlining backend workflows to building dashboards for non-technical decision makers. I love blending structured logic with creative clarity, and my superpower is making technical insights easy to understand and even easier to act on.



How I Help Companies
I help companies turn scattered, messy data into smart, actionable decisions. Whether it’s through building predictive models, streamlining ETL pipelines, or creating clean, intuitive dashboards, my focus is always on solving real problems with real impact.
At the same time, I believe good analytics shouldn’t be intimidating. My job is to make data useful to marketing teams, operations managers, and executives who need clarity, not complexity.



Education


<h3>Boston University</h3>
<p>M.S. in Applied Business Analytics (2024–ongoing)<br>
Coursework emphasizes predictive modeling, operations management, and cloud analytics with Spark, AWS, and Tableau.</p>


<h3>MIT World Peace University</h3>
<p>B.Sc. in Computer Science (2019–2022, GPA: 3.83/4.0)<br>
Foundation in programming, system design, and lean operations.</p>





Skills



Programming, Analytics & Data Science


Python, R, SQL, C++, C, forecasting, time series analysis, clustering, A/B testing.




Visualization & BI


Power BI, Tableau, Excel, SAS, Dataiku, storytelling dashboards, ETL automation.




Databases & Cloud


PostgreSQL, MySQL, BigQuery, AWS (S3, EC2, SageMaker), Azure, Spark SQL, Airflow.




Web & DevOps


HTML, CSS, JavaScript, GitHub, Quarto, Git workflows, cloud deployment.






Experience


Maharaj Multi-Systems


Boosted operational efficiency by 15% through workflow automation and CRM audits. Reduced processing errors by 25% and improved client retention by 30%.




Pimpri Chinchwad Media Communication


Reduced technical resolution times by 20%. Supported system deployments and strengthened client retention by 40% through solution-focused support.





Projects


New York Real Estate Analysis


Led regression and time series modeling to predict housing prices. Explored seasonal demand trends and outlier behavior in NYC’s market.




Skincare Sales Data Analysis


Analyzed sales data to uncover discount sensitivity and product loyalty patterns. Building an interactive dashboard to visualize consumer behavior trends.




Stickley Adhesives Optimization


Mapped workflows and optimized production operations using Lean methodology. Proposed changes projected to reduce material waste by 10%.




AI vs Non-AI Job Growth Dashboard


Scraped and visualized job market data comparing AI vs non-AI job demand across industries. Dashboard hosted on AWS for HR and student insights.





Volunteering


Youth Empowerment Foundation


Mentored underserved students, organized skill workshops, and led educational drives.




Help Social Welfare Society


Supported food, medicine, and eldercare logistics for marginalized communities.




Sahaas for Animals


Volunteered at a local animal shelter, managing care and outreach activities.





Contact
Location: Boston, MA
Email: sharmavidhi3008@gmail.com
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/vidhi-sharma
GitHub: github.com/VidhiSharma2000
Download My Resume

title: Education
text:
Professional Certifications
In addition to my formal education, I’ve pursued several professional certifications to enhance my skills in specific areas:


Front-End Development
Issuing Organization: Meta
Date Completed: March 2024
This certification focused on modern web development using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and responsive design principles, providing hands-on experience with front-end frameworks.


HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Issuing Organization: Johns Hopkins University
Date Completed: January 2023
Comprehensive web development certification covering fundamental and advanced concepts in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with emphasis on modern web application development.


Python Basics
Issuing Organization: University of Michigan
Date Completed: November 2022
Certification in Python programming fundamentals, including data structures, algorithms, file handling, and basic data analysis using Python libraries.




CS50x Computer Science
Issuing Organization: HarvardX, Harvard University
Date Completed: August 2022
Introduction to computer science and programming covering algorithms, data structures, resource management, software engineering, and web development using multiple languages including C, Python, SQL, and JavaScript.


Introduction to Psychology
Issuing Organization: Yale University
Date Completed: May 2022
This certification provided an understanding of human behavior and cognitive processes, which enhances my ability to analyze user behavior and create more effective data visualizations and user interfaces.

title: About Me
text:
Hello! I’m Vidhi, a passionate analytics student currently pursuing my Master of Science in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University. With a background in Computer Science and professional experience as a Business Analyst, I’m developing advanced skills to tackle complex problems through technology and analytics.
My journey in data started during my undergraduate studies, where I discovered the power of transforming raw data into meaningful insights. Since then, I’ve been on a mission to leverage data-driven approaches to solve real-world challenges and enable better business decisions.

title: Professional Experience
text: My professional journey spans roles in data analysis, software development, and database management, providing me with a diverse skill set and cross-functional expertise.

title: Professional Experience
text: My professional journey spans roles in data analysis, software development, and database management, providing me with a diverse skill set and cross-functional expertise.

title: Professional Experience
text:
Analyst

Maharaj Multi-Systems

January 2024 - July 2024

As an Analyst at Maharaj Multi-Systems, I focused on optimizing operational workflows and improving data accuracy across business systems.
Key Responsibilities: - Conducted in-depth data analysis to identify operational inefficiencies and opportunities for improvement - Maintained and improved CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot) to enhance data quality and user experience - Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and optimize resource allocation - Developed and maintained dashboards for monitoring key performance indicators and business metrics - Provided analytical support for decision-making across departments
Key Achievements: - Boosted workflow efficiency by 15% through operational data analysis and process reengineering - Reduced data processing errors by 25% through implementation of improved validation procedures - Improved CRM accuracy, leading to a 30% increase in client retention - Developed automated reporting solutions that saved team members an average of 5 hours per week - Streamlined operations workflow resulting in 20% reduced processing time for client requests

title: Professional Experience
text:
Software and Database Management Intern

Pimpri Chinchwad Media Communication

August 2022 - August 2023

During my internship at Pimpri Chinchwad Media Communication, I gained hands-on experience in software troubleshooting, database management, and technical support.
Key Responsibilities: - Provided technical support and troubleshooting for internal software systems and applications - Assisted in database management, including data entry, cleaning, and basic query operations - Participated in deployment cycles and software updates under supervision - Supported end-to-end project management for small-scale technical initiatives - Communicated technical information to non-technical users and clients
Key Achievements: - Reduced resolution times by 20% through implementation of efficient troubleshooting protocols - Assisted in successful deployment of 3 major system upgrades with minimal disruption - Contributed to database optimization that improved query response times by 15% - Increased client retention by 40% through solution-oriented communication and technical support - Developed a knowledge base that reduced recurring support tickets by 25%

title: Professional Experience
text:
Industry Experience
My experience spans multiple industries, providing me with varied perspectives and adaptable problem-solving approaches:


Technology
Working at technology-focused organizations has given me experience with software development lifecycles, technical project management, and cutting-edge tools. I’ve developed a deep understanding of how technology solutions are built, deployed, and maintained.


Media & Communications
My experience in media and communications has enhanced my understanding of content management, audience analytics, and communication strategies. I’ve learned how data can inform content creation and distribution decisions.


Business Operations
Across roles, I’ve gained expertise in business operations, including workflow optimization, resource allocation, and performance tracking. This experience allows me to bridge the gap between technical solutions and business needs.

title: Projects
text: This page showcases my key academic and personal projects, demonstrating my technical abilities and analytical skills.

title: Projects
text:
Academic Projects

New York Real Estate Analysis

Tools & Technologies: R, Time Series Analysis, Regression Modeling, Data Visualization
Description:
Led time series and regression analysis on residential real estate data to identify key sales trends and predictors across different New York neighborhoods.
Key Contributions: - Analyzed 5+ years of historical property data to identify seasonal patterns and price drivers - Built predictive models with 85% accuracy to forecast future price trends - Created interactive visualizations showing neighborhood-by-neighborhood price evolution - Identified key factors influencing property values, including proximity to public transport and school district ratings
Outcome:
The analysis provided actionable insights for real estate investors and urban planners, highlighting areas with growth potential and revealing the impact of public infrastructure on property values.



Stickley Adhesives Operations Analysis & Process Optimization

Tools & Technologies: Excel, Process Mapping, Statistical Analysis, Cost-Benefit Analysis
Description:
Analyzed business processes for a manufacturing company and proposed workflow improvements in a comprehensive managerial report for Operations Management course.
Key Contributions: - Conducted time-motion studies to identify bottlenecks in production processes - Developed process flow diagrams to visualize current state and proposed improvements - Performed cost-benefit analysis of implementing recommended changes - Created implementation timeline and change management framework
Outcome:
Recommendations projected to reduce production time by 18% and decrease material waste by 12%, with potential annual savings of $125,000 if implemented.

title: Projects
text:
Personal Projects

Skincare Sales Data Analysis

Tools & Technologies: Python, Pandas, Tableau, SQL
Description:
Self-initiated project exploring consumer behavior, sales trends, and pricing strategy in the beauty industry, currently working on dashboard deployment.
Key Contributions: - Collected and cleaned sales data from multiple sources using Python and SQL - Analyzed customer segmentation and purchasing patterns - Identified correlation between pricing strategies and consumer retention - Built interactive Tableau dashboard to visualize findings
Outcome:
Created a comprehensive analysis that provides insights into optimal pricing strategies, seasonal trends, and customer demographics. Currently finalizing an interactive dashboard for publication.



AI vs Non-AI Job Growth Analysis

Tools & Technologies: Python, AWS, Data Visualization, Web Scraping
Description:
Studied employment trends across industries in 2024 and visualized insights in an AWS-deployed dashboard to understand the impact of AI adoption on job markets.
Key Contributions: - Gathered data from multiple job boards and economic reports through web scraping - Analyzed growth patterns in AI-centric roles versus traditional positions - Developed interactive visualizations showing industry-specific trends - Deployed results as a web application using AWS services
Outcome:
The analysis revealed a 34% increase in AI-related positions while showing varying impacts across different industries. The interactive dashboard allows users to explore trends by industry, role type, and geographic region.

title: Projects
text:
